name: Trollking Grunt
description: The Trollking Grunt is a robust humanoid with thick hide and notable strength. It boasts a large frame and tough skin, making it a formidable opponent.
memorable: Its exceptional regenerative ability allows it to regain hit points each turn, making it difficult to defeat unless fire or acid is used.
goals: To engage in combat and defend its territory.
relations: Often found working alongside other trolls or trollkin.
environment: Typically found in rugged, wilderness areas or near troll lairs.
strengths: High strength allows for powerful melee attacks, and strong regenerative abilities can sustain it in battle.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to acid and fire damage, which inhibit its regeneration.
attacks: Capable of multiattacking with a spear or longbow, dealing significant piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration allows it to heal during combat unless it takes fire or acid damage.
equipment: Hide armor and simple weapons (spear and longbow)
additional_information: Low intelligence affects its capabilities in intelligence-based tasks
Can attack at range or in melee with different weapons
Thick skin contributes to its decent armor class
Moderate challenge rating suitable for encounters
test_queries: monster that dislikes fire and acid
strong troll-like humanoid in the wild
humanoid with thick skin and strong regeneration
multiattack creature armed with spear and longbow
